alert.note: Alert for Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 3:24AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the lower elevations, and 12 to 18 inches across the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most intense snowfall rates will occur early this morning through midday before weakening this afternoon. Isolated to scattered power outages are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
